text: Sano naga n’di ŵakusimonga (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ ya kakanile ka makafili), basi chakusimosya nnope nikuŵecheta kwao (kwanti): “Ana tuli tusyuchile litaka, nambo yakuona uwwejo tuchiŵa soni mu kagumbidwe kasambano?” Ŵanganyao ni aŵala ŵanganankulupilila M’mbuje gwao, soni ŵanganyao makongwa tigakaŵe mu ngosi mwao, soni ŵanganyao niŵandu ŵa ku Moto, ŵanyao kwalakweko takaŵe ŵandamo
